title: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure - Handson Labs
description: A series of handson labs produced by REAL - the Red Expert Alliance - to get introduced to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

courses.title: UNDER CONSTRUCTION: An introduction to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure core concepts
courses.description: First steps on OCI - learn about tenancy, compartments, console, CLI, Object Storage, resource management

courses.title: An introduction to Project Fn
courses.description: Create, deploy and run serverless functions using Project Fn, in JavaScript, Java, Python and more.

courses.title: Serverless Functions on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
courses.description: Getting started with Functions on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure.

courses.title: API Gateway on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
courses.description: Getting started with API Gateway on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure - expose a stock response,  HTTP Backend and Serverless Functions.

courses.title: Functions, Object Storage and API Gateway on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
courses.description: Next steps with Serverless Functions on OCI, Object Storage and API Gateway.

courses.title: OCI (Event) Streaming, combined with Functions and API Gateway
courses.description: Getting started with OCI Streaming and combining with Functions and API Gateway.

courses.title: Preparation for OCI Workshops
courses.description: Manage OCI LAB environment for Katacoda Scenarios
